headline: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) Completes US$4 Billion Offering and Announces Acquisition Plans
summary: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) recently completed a follow-on equity offering totaling $4 billion. Despite broader market trends showing gains, the company's share price declined by 5% last month. The equity offering may have added pressure, as significant share issuances can affect supply-demand dynamics. Meanwhile, broader market indicators such as a benign inflation report and positive developments in U.S.-China trade talks buoyed major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, which have experienced...

headline: Brown & Brown to buy Accession Risk Management for $9.82bn
summary: Accession subsidiaries Risk Strategies and One80 Intermediaries will be integrated into Brown & Brown’s Retail and Specialty Distribution segments, respectively.

headline: Brown & Brown: A Great Move By An Expensive Firm
summary: Brown & Brown's $9.8B acquisition boosts specialty insurance reach with debt and equity. BRO shares are richly valued. See why I maintain a 'hold' rating.

headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. announces pricing of $4 billion offering of common stock
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., June 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE: BRO) (“Brown & Brown” or the “Company”) today announced the pricing of its public offering of 39,215,686 shares of its common stock (the “common stock”), par value $0.10 per share, at a price to the public of $102.00 per share, for an aggregate offering amount of $4 billion.
